text: Ana nen Zisas ga nzuaim, Zisas mbaram ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Nde ntige kha tugen vhuuŋgia ki gumgi gu mbigi, nde Fhe Bakɨme mbui bigi khothivi fhuvara. Nden ndɨkndɨgi gum nden tɨvi guigira nzerigi fhuvara. Gu khara muuŋgip nde phorgɨ kɨv, nden simtɨgi ndirie?” Zisas ne mbe suaŋgiap, mbaram khaŋ mba guma ga nzuai, “Ndu won kama ndigi khar zɨ.”
